revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Roku |model=LT |revision=(2700X) |asin=B00GHGMCN4 |fcc_date=09/17/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Lite-On |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=media streamer |fcc_id=TC2-R1007 |ic_id=5959A-2700X |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM7218 |cpu1_cspeed=600 |cpu1_cores= |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model= |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B4G1646B-HYK0 |expansion_if_types=HDMI |expansion_hdmi_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43143;BCM43143KMLG, HN1310 P20, P9MKR 3 W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |addl_chips= |flags=HDMI |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= }} {{TagLine|Streaming Media Player}} :[[wikipedia:Roku|'''Roku''' on Wikipedia]] {{see also|Roku}} *"SWD2158_V03" and "323G060323T7B" <small>(or something like that)</small> :is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. *The [https://fccid.io/TC2-R1007 TC2-R1007] FCC ID covers both 2700X and 2710X... :which are likely quite similar.
The manufacturer stated in the FCC test report is :''Dong Guan G-Com Computer Co., Ltd.'' :(presumably part of the ''[[Lite-On]]'' Group).
===PSU=== Power adapters specified in the FCC test report are... :'''Roku''' FFA-1200500SUA (120VAC/60Hz, 0.3A - 12VDC, 0.5A) :'''Roku''' WA-06A12FU (120VAC/60Hz, 0.3A - 12VDC, 0.5A)
